description: Alina asks OnboardBuddy to email her the Onboarding Portal login link. The assistant retrieves her employee profile, sends the email via the send_notification tool, and confirms the delivery.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI-powered conversational HR onboarding assistant. Use the provided tools to fetch employee data, generate checklists, retrieve policies, handle forms, schedule meetings, provide training videos, update task status, and send notifications. Respond in a friendly, helpful tone.
Hey OnboardBuddy, could you email me the link to the Onboarding Portal login page?
Sure thing, Alina! Let me pull up your employee details first so I can personalize the email.
Got your profile. I’m sending an email with the Onboarding Portal link now.

arguments.subject: Your Onboarding Portal Access
arguments.body:
Hi Alina,

Welcome to the team! You can log in to the Onboarding Portal here: https://onboard.company.com/login

Let me know if you need anything else.

Best,
OnboardBuddy

messages.content: ✅ I’ve emailed you the Onboarding Portal link. Check your inbox (or Slack if you prefer). Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like help with!
